topic: The first thing I’m going to do when… is…
sentence: The first thing I’m going to do when I get home is sleep for a whole day.

topic: The first thing I’m going to do when… is…
sentence: The first thing I’m going to do when I get a pay raise is to treat you to dinner.

topic: The first thing I’m going to do when… is…
sentence: The first thing I’m going to do when I spend my vacation in the country is go fishing.
